discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABD
If I would response to the question from the Customer Voice View, I would select A,B,D.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-voice/distribution-settings

Question is outdated. 
FormsPro/Customer Voice is now the new survey functionality.
Voice of the Customer was deprecated on July 1, 2020.

choices.B: An optional invitation email, utilizing either a direct email or an email template, may be sent to each potential non-anonymous respondent.
choices.C: As an option, the design of your survey can include a limitation that restricts multiple completions by a single non-anonymous respondent.
choices.A: When distributing your Dynamics 365 for Marketing Survey, you may invite either anonymous or non-anonymous respondents.
choices.D: All respondents will receive the exactly same hyperlink to connect them to the survey that you are inviting them to complete.

questions.question_text:
You are the manager of Internet sales for your company.
You have been asked to create and distribute a post-purchase survey to both registered and guest customers purchasing on your site.
Which three things will be true about the distribution of your survey? (Choose three.) Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

DRAG DROP -
Using the Case Study information, indicate which Staff is responsible for performing each of the Activities listed below.
To answer, drag the Staff to the appropriate Activity. Each Staff item may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
For the furst one: Marketing administration
"Marketing Administration is responsible for ensuring each marketing page is used appropriately and contains the required field values. 
--> Analyzing page performance will be a key element."

comments.content:
Correction: 
1.BU Admin
2.BU Admin
3.Marketing Pro
4.Marketing Pro
5.Marketing Pro

for the last one:
not bu admin because it is not about decision of granting or rejecting but of "initiating the approval REQUEST" and then they await the response: " After content is approved, they are responsible for going live."

discussion.content:
Read the case: 
My answer 
1.BU Admin
2.BU Admin
3.Marketing Pro
4.Marketing Pro
5.BU Admin

questions.answer_description:
Each Business Unit has multiple Marketing Professionals, responsible for creating Customer Journeys and using Customer Insights for reporting. After content is approved, they are responsible for going live.
Each Business Unit has a Marketing Administrator responsible for approval of content, subscription adherence and investigation of blocked emails and stopped
Contacts.
Marketing Administration is responsible for ensuring each marketing page is used appropriately and contains the required field values. Analyzing page performance will be a key element.

discussion.content:
Based on what I saw from: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-insights/journeys/insights

The list of Areas that provide analytics, statistics and KPI's are the below list:
Contacts
Leads
Segments
Customer journeys
Email messages
Lead scoring models
Marketing pages
Marketing forms
Websites
Redirect URLs

The correct Answer should be BDE

Selected Answer: ACD
Lead scoring models are used to evaluate and rank leads based on behavior and demographics but do not provide direct insights or analytics about marketing activities. same for accounts and contacts - no KPIs there

questions.question_text:
You are part of the marketing department at AdventureWorks Cycles and recently started using Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys.

You want to know the results of the different marketing activities run across the organization. Specifically, the statistics, analytics, and key performance indicators (KPIs) based on your marketing results.

On which three entities can you find this information? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

DRAG DROP
-

Tasmanian Traders is a furniture company selling wooden furniture through their website. Until now, email has been their only channel of communication with their customers. The company now wishes to expand their communication channels to also include SMS with keywords.

You need to create the SMS keywords.

Which four actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the four appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area. Arrange the four actions in the correct order.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Go to SMS keywords in the settings.

Navigate to the SMS settings section where keywords can be managed.
Select +New.

Start the creation of a new SMS keyword.
Input the keyword.

Define the keyword that customers will use to interact with your SMS system.
Configure the correct settings for the keyword.

Specify the actions associated with the keyword, such as automatic responses or triggering journeys.
